title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: From the Ascension game mode post two weeks ago you've told us that Poro King is going to be on 15/7 - 18/7, so there's no point hiding it from us. You're going to put Poro King on for two fortnights in a row and yet put a 9 week gap between URF modes? Some planning you have there for the most popular game mode.

no its a mystery,
you haven't read the surrenderat20 secrets and other twitter notes from them saying they updating the game for nexus seige and HD doom bots...
It's not a mystery what's on next week - in the ascension post two weeks ago it says that 15/7 - 18/7 is poro king mode
Poro King will NOT be next weeks mode (15th Jul).
last week one changed it and they pushed it to the 3rd week after, nothing suggestes it will double up, but I'm not saying it's impossible either

ofc I, like some, believe they really could be releasing the new objective based Nexus siege.
And there has been numerous murmurs about them really getting into reworking Doom bots soon...

Maybe have a doombot Jhin that creates multiple rings of trpas around him. His W maybe snaring anything without having the showtime mark. Maybe his Q will now bounce infinitely between any target until there is the last one remaining....
Ult omg lol maybe the jhin ult can be an even crazier version of doombot Lux back in 2014.
If you mean that a different game mode might come out next week even though they already said that it would be poro mode, then i'm thrilled

Wasn't the whole reason for removing Dominion because no one played it? if so, then why keep pushing Dominion/Ascension, from what I see no one really wants/likes these modes. I don't really like urf much at all, but I'd prefer that over these modes, not to mention people are essentially begging for Doom Bots. Crystal Scar is a terrible map with only terrible game modes, I think it's time to erase the Dominion code Riot, or at least archive it forever. I'm loving the rotating queue, and I hope it never goes away, but I don't think many would complain or even notice if you never used Crystal Scar game modes again.

No Pls :(

Crystal Scar maps are my favorite. They are the fastest, most action packed modes which make them League's hyperbolic time chambers when it comes to learning a champion's dueling/teamfight mechanics and positioning. I learned some of my best SR champs playing Dominion on NA.
I find Urf rather dull because its just spammy gimmicks and no one really cares about the outcome, which is I suppose why others like it so much.
Doom Bots I can get behind as a fun challenge of a mode, but it's length of engagement is limited once you can easily beat the max level bots. Regardless I'd be excited for it to come back as well!

You're now one of my favourite Rioters! 

#Dominion
As a dominion-only player, wait no I'll continue to be unlike the rest of OCE and keep my toxic thoughts to myself.
That's ok
I would care.
FUCK OFF RIOT. GIVE US URF
Yep and Doom Bots
bring back urf
doom bots first

The map is buggy as hell, random fps drops, altar in the middle sometimes just stops being captured and goes inert, champions disappearing when I Q them as yi (oh wait no that one's not a bug) but yeah this is seriously unpolished stuff riot.

2 ??? modes...
hmm lol doom butts incoming

i don't think this game mode should still be apart of the rotation. ascension is fun but this mode is just basically the same as before and doesn't do much to improve the gameplay overall. 

but otherwise totally hyped to play nexus seige. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 
doom bots {{champion:1}}

Get rid off it. This gamemode is so bad you carnt even have comebacks, have fair games, or do anything if your vs an team to the point were you carnt even walk out of base so that seems fair? Well its not an it not one bit fun no matter how you put it.
it's just that You can't pick defensive champs or aoe for this... {{item:3632}} {{item:3640}}
I would've preferred Poro King to this, and that's saying a lot because I hate Poro King.

lol get used to defensive games and the thrill of them losing points the suspense of keeping more towers than them
maybe you are just some scum addicted to kills and winning games by ganking people
Yea so much suspense a zyra, heimeer and illaoi camping a tower. So much fucking fun, definintly skill based and intense
no one wants any other gm execpt urdf so why not just bringg iit back
